venue.name: Rabb Auditorium at Boston Public Library in Copley Square

item.description:
We will meet in the usual spot: the right side of the library's lobby by the bench.
See you tomorrow!

Remember to bring extra business cards with your catch phrases on the back. We'll go over elevator speeches, discuss future activites in the group, and last but not least Meghan will give her presentation, don't miss it!!

PS: If you can't find someone to bring you should still come to the meeting!!!

group.name: The Boston Green Business Networking Group

item.name: Bring a friend or co-worker!
